00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00038 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00039 
00040 /* tmp struct for parsing routes */
00041 struct lnet_text_buf {
00042         struct list_head        ltb_list;       /* stash on lists */
00043         int                     ltb_size;       /* allocated size */
00044         char                    ltb_text[0];    /* text buffer */
00045 };
00046 
00047 static int lnet_tbnob = 0;                      /* track text buf allocation */
00048 #define LNET_MAX_TEXTBUF_NOB     (64<<10)       /* bound allocation */
00049 #define LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB  (4<<10)
00050 
00051 static void
00052 lnet_syntax(char *name, char *str, int offset, int width)
00053 {
00054         static char dots[LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB];
00055         static char dashes[LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB];
00056 
00057         memset(dots, '.', sizeof(dots));
00058         dots[sizeof(dots)-1] = 0;
00059         memset(dashes, '-', sizeof(dashes));
00060         dashes[sizeof(dashes)-1] = 0;
00061 
00062         LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x10f, "Error parsing '%s=\"%s\"'\n", name, str);
00063         LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x110, "here...........%.*s..%.*s|%.*s|\n",
00064                            (int)strlen(name), dots, offset, dots,
00065                             (width < 1) ? 0 : width - 1, dashes);
00066 }
00067 
00068 static int
00069 lnet_issep (char c)
00070 {
00071         switch (c) {
00072         case '\n':
00073         case '\r':
00074         case ';':
00075                 return 1;
00076         default:
00077                 return 0;
00078         }
00079 }
00080 
00081 int
00082 lnet_net_unique(__u32 net, struct list_head *nilist)
00083 {
00084         struct list_head *tmp;
00085         lnet_ni_t        *ni;
00086 
00087         list_for_each(tmp, nilist) {
00088                 ni = list_entry(tmp, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
00089 
00090                 if (LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid) == net)
00091                         return 0;
00092         }
00093 
00094         return 1;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void
00098 lnet_ni_free(struct lnet_ni *ni)
00099 {
00100         int i;
00101 
00102         if (ni->ni_refs != NULL)
00103                 cfs_percpt_free(ni->ni_refs);
00104 
00105         if (ni->ni_tx_queues != NULL)
00106                 cfs_percpt_free(ni->ni_tx_queues);
00107 
00108         if (ni->ni_cpts != NULL)
00109                 cfs_expr_list_values_free(ni->ni_cpts, ni->ni_ncpts);
00110 
00111         if (ni->ni_lnd_tunables != NULL)
00112                 LIBCFS_FREE(ni->ni_lnd_tunables, sizeof(*ni->ni_lnd_tunables));
00113 
00114         for (i = 0; i < LNET_MAX_INTERFACES &&
00115                     ni->ni_interfaces[i] != NULL; i++) {
00116                 LIBCFS_FREE(ni->ni_interfaces[i],
00117                             strlen(ni->ni_interfaces[i]) + 1);
00118         }
00119         LIBCFS_FREE(ni, sizeof(*ni));
00120 }
00121 
00122 lnet_ni_t *
00123 lnet_ni_alloc(__u32 net, struct cfs_expr_list *el, struct list_head *nilist)
00124 {
00125         struct lnet_tx_queue    *tq;
00126         struct lnet_ni          *ni;
00127         int                     rc;
00128         int                     i;
00129 
00130         if (!lnet_net_unique(net, nilist)) {
00131                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x111, "Duplicate network specified: %s\n",
00132                                    libcfs_net2str(net));
00133                 return NULL;
00134         }
00135 
00136         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ni, sizeof(*ni));
00137         if (ni == NULL) {
00138                 CERROR("Out of memory creating network %s\n",
00139                        libcfs_net2str(net));
00140                 return NULL;
00141         }
00142 
00143         spin_lock_init(&ni->ni_lock);
00144         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ni->ni_cptlist);
00145         ni->ni_refs = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(),
00146                                        sizeof(*ni->ni_refs[0]));
00147         if (ni->ni_refs == NULL)
00148                 goto failed;
00149 
00150         ni->ni_tx_queues = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(),
00151                                             sizeof(*ni->ni_tx_queues[0]));
00152         if (ni->ni_tx_queues == NULL)
00153                 goto failed;
00154 
00155         cfs_percpt_for_each(tq, i, ni->ni_tx_queues)
00156                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tq->tq_delayed);
00157 
00158         if (el == NULL) {
00159                 ni->ni_cpts  = NULL;
00160                 ni->ni_ncpts = LNET_CPT_NUMBER;
00161         } else {
00162                 rc = cfs_expr_list_values(el, LNET_CPT_NUMBER, &ni->ni_cpts);
00163                 if (rc <= 0) {
00164                         CERROR("Failed to set CPTs for NI %s: %d\n",
00165                                libcfs_net2str(net), rc);
00166                         goto failed;
00167                 }
00168 
00169                 LASSERT(rc <= LNET_CPT_NUMBER);
00170                 if (rc == LNET_CPT_NUMBER) {
00171                         LIBCFS_FREE(ni->ni_cpts, rc * sizeof(ni->ni_cpts[0]));
00172                         ni->ni_cpts = NULL;
00173                 }
00174 
00175                 ni->ni_ncpts = rc;
00176         }
00177 
00178         /* LND will fill in the address part of the NID */
00179         ni->ni_nid = LNET_MKNID(net, 0);
00180         ni->ni_last_alive = cfs_time_current_sec();
00181         list_add_tail(&ni->ni_list, nilist);
00182         return ni;
00183  failed:
00184         lnet_ni_free(ni);
00185         return NULL;
00186 }
00187 
00188 int
00189 lnet_parse_networks(struct list_head *nilist, char *networks)
00190 {
00191         struct cfs_expr_list *el = NULL;
00192         int             tokensize;
00193         char            *tokens;
00194         char            *str;
00195         char            *tmp;
00196         struct lnet_ni  *ni;
00197         __u32           net;
00198         int             nnets = 0;
00199         struct list_head *temp_node;
00200 
00201         if (networks == NULL) {
00202                 CERROR("networks string is undefined\n");
00203                 return -EINVAL;
00204         }
00205 
00206         if (strlen(networks) > LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB) {
00207                 /* _WAY_ conservative */
00208                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x112, "Can't parse networks: string too "
00209                                    "long\n");
00210                 return -EINVAL;
00211         }
00212 
00213         tokensize = strlen(networks) + 1;
00214 
00215         LIBCFS_ALLOC(tokens, tokensize);
00216         if (tokens == NULL) {
00217                 CERROR("Can't allocate net tokens\n");
00218                 return -ENOMEM;
00219         }
00220 
00221         memcpy(tokens, networks, tokensize);
00222         str = tmp = tokens;
00223 
00224         while (str != NULL && *str != 0) {
00225                 char    *comma = strchr(str, ',');
00226                 char    *bracket = strchr(str, '(');
00227                 char    *square = strchr(str, '[');
00228                 char    *iface;
00229                 int     niface;
00230                 int     rc;
00231 
00232                 /* NB we don't check interface conflicts here; it's the LNDs
00233                  * responsibility (if it cares at all) */
00234 
00235                 if (square != NULL && (comma == NULL || square < comma)) {
00236                         /* i.e: o2ib0(ib0)[1,2], number between square
00237                          * brackets are CPTs this NI needs to be bond */
00238                         if (bracket != NULL && bracket > square) {
00239                                 tmp = square;
00240                                 goto failed_syntax;
00241                         }
00242 
00243                         tmp = strchr(square, ']');
00244                         if (tmp == NULL) {
00245                                 tmp = square;
00246                                 goto failed_syntax;
00247                         }
00248 
00249                         rc = cfs_expr_list_parse(square, tmp - square + 1,
00250                                                  0, LNET_CPT_NUMBER - 1, &el);
00251                         if (rc != 0) {
00252                                 tmp = square;
00253                                 goto failed_syntax;
00254                         }
00255 
00256                         while (square <= tmp)
00257                                 *square++ = ' ';
00258                 }
00259 
00260                 if (bracket == NULL ||
00261                     (comma != NULL && comma < bracket)) {
00262 
00263                         /* no interface list specified */
00264 
00265                         if (comma != NULL)
00266                                 *comma++ = 0;
00267                         net = libcfs_str2net(cfs_trimwhite(str));
00268 
00269                         if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY)) {
00270                                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x113, "Unrecognised network"
00271                                                    " type\n");
00272                                 tmp = str;
00273                                 goto failed_syntax;
00274                         }
00275 
00276                         if (LNET_NETTYP(net) != LOLND && /* LO is implicit */
00277                             lnet_ni_alloc(net, el, nilist) == NULL)
00278                                 goto failed;
00279 
00280                         if (el != NULL) {
00281                                 cfs_expr_list_free(el);
00282                                 el = NULL;
00283                         }
00284 
00285                         str = comma;
00286                         continue;
00287                 }
00288 
00289                 *bracket = 0;
00290                 net = libcfs_str2net(cfs_trimwhite(str));
00291                 if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY)) {
00292                         tmp = str;
00293                         goto failed_syntax;
00294                 }
00295 
00296                 ni = lnet_ni_alloc(net, el, nilist);
00297                 if (ni == NULL)
00298                         goto failed;
00299 
00300                 if (el != NULL) {
00301                         cfs_expr_list_free(el);
00302                         el = NULL;
00303                 }
00304 
00305                 niface = 0;
00306                 iface = bracket + 1;
00307 
00308                 bracket = strchr(iface, ')');
00309                 if (bracket == NULL) {
00310                         tmp = iface;
00311                         goto failed_syntax;
00312                 }
00313 
00314                 *bracket = 0;
00315                 do {
00316                         comma = strchr(iface, ',');
00317                         if (comma != NULL)
00318                                 *comma++ = 0;
00319 
00320                         iface = cfs_trimwhite(iface);
00321                         if (*iface == 0) {
00322                                 tmp = iface;
00323                                 goto failed_syntax;
00324                         }
00325 
00326                         if (niface == LNET_MAX_INTERFACES) {
00327                                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x115, "Too many interfaces "
00328                                                    "for net %s\n",
00329                                                    libcfs_net2str(net));
00330                                 goto failed;
00331                         }
00332 
00333                         /* Allocate a separate piece of memory and copy
00334                          * into it the string, so we don't have
00335                          * a depencency on the tokens string.  This way we
00336                          * can free the tokens at the end of the function.
00337                          * The newly allocated ni_interfaces[] can be
00338                          * freed when freeing the NI */
00339                         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ni->ni_interfaces[niface],
00340                                      strlen(iface) + 1);
00341                         if (ni->ni_interfaces[niface] == NULL) {
00342                                 CERROR("Can't allocate net interface name\n");
00343                                 goto failed;
00344                         }
00345                         strncpy(ni->ni_interfaces[niface], iface,
00346                                 strlen(iface));
00347                         niface++;
00348                         iface = comma;
00349                 } while (iface != NULL);
00350 
00351                 str = bracket + 1;
00352                 comma = strchr(bracket + 1, ',');
00353                 if (comma != NULL) {
00354                         *comma = 0;
00355                         str = cfs_trimwhite(str);
00356                         if (*str != 0) {
00357                                 tmp = str;
00358                                 goto failed_syntax;
00359                         }
00360                         str = comma + 1;
00361                         continue;
00362                 }
00363 
00364                 str = cfs_trimwhite(str);
00365                 if (*str != 0) {
00366                         tmp = str;
00367                         goto failed_syntax;
00368                 }
00369         }
00370 
00371         list_for_each(temp_node, nilist)
00372                 nnets++;
00373 
00374         LIBCFS_FREE(tokens, tokensize);
00375         return nnets;
00376 
00377  failed_syntax:
00378         lnet_syntax("networks", networks, (int)(tmp - tokens), strlen(tmp));
00379  failed:
00380         while (!list_empty(nilist)) {
00381                 ni = list_entry(nilist->next, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
00382 
00383                 list_del(&ni->ni_list);
00384                 lnet_ni_free(ni);
00385         }
00386 
00387         if (el != NULL)
00388                 cfs_expr_list_free(el);
00389 
00390         LIBCFS_FREE(tokens, tokensize);
00391 
00392         return -EINVAL;
00393 }
00394 
00395 static struct lnet_text_buf *lnet_new_text_buf(int str_len)
00396 {
00397         struct lnet_text_buf *ltb;
00398         int nob;
00399 
00400         /* NB allocate space for the terminating 0 */
00401         nob = offsetof(struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_text[str_len + 1]);
00402         if (nob > LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB) {
00403                 /* _way_ conservative for "route net gateway..." */
00404                 CERROR("text buffer too big\n");
00405                 return NULL;
00406         }
00407 
00408         if (lnet_tbnob + nob > LNET_MAX_TEXTBUF_NOB) {
00409                 CERROR("Too many text buffers\n");
00410                 return NULL;
00411         }
00412 
00413         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ltb, nob);
00414         if (ltb == NULL)
00415                 return NULL;
00416 
00417         ltb->ltb_size = nob;
00418         ltb->ltb_text[0] = 0;
00419         lnet_tbnob += nob;
00420         return ltb;
00421 }
00422 
00423 static void
00424 lnet_free_text_buf(struct lnet_text_buf *ltb)
00425 {
00426         lnet_tbnob -= ltb->ltb_size;
00427         LIBCFS_FREE(ltb, ltb->ltb_size);
00428 }
00429 
00430 static void
00431 lnet_free_text_bufs(struct list_head *tbs)
00432 {
00433         struct lnet_text_buf  *ltb;
00434 
00435         while (!list_empty(tbs)) {
00436                 ltb = list_entry(tbs->next, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
00437 
00438                 list_del(&ltb->ltb_list);
00439                 lnet_free_text_buf(ltb);
00440         }
00441 }
00442 
00443 void
00444 lnet_print_text_bufs(struct list_head *tbs)
00445 {
00446         struct list_head *tmp;
00447         struct lnet_text_buf  *ltb;
00448 
00449         list_for_each(tmp, tbs) {
00450                 ltb = list_entry(tmp, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
00451 
00452                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%s\n", ltb->ltb_text);
00453         }
00454 
00455         CDEBUG(D_WARNING, "%d allocated\n", lnet_tbnob);
00456 }
00457 
00458 static int
00459 lnet_str2tbs_sep(struct list_head *tbs, char *str)
00460 {
00461         struct list_head  pending;
00462         char             *sep;
00463         int               nob;
00464         int               i;
00465         struct lnet_text_buf  *ltb;
00466 
00467         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&pending);
00468 
00469         /* Split 'str' into separate commands */
00470         for (;;) {
00471                 /* skip leading whitespace */
00472                 while (isspace(*str))
00473                         str++;
00474 
00475                 /* scan for separator or comment */
00476                 for (sep = str; *sep != 0; sep++)
00477                         if (lnet_issep(*sep) || *sep == '#')
00478                                 break;
00479 
00480                 nob = (int)(sep - str);
00481                 if (nob > 0) {
00482                         ltb = lnet_new_text_buf(nob);
00483                         if (ltb == NULL) {
00484                                 lnet_free_text_bufs(&pending);
00485                                 return -ENOMEM;
00486                         }
00487 
00488                         for (i = 0; i < nob; i++)
00489                                 if (isspace(str[i]))
00490                                         ltb->ltb_text[i] = ' ';
00491                                 else
00492                                         ltb->ltb_text[i] = str[i];
00493 
00494                         ltb->ltb_text[nob] = 0;
00495 
00496                         list_add_tail(&ltb->ltb_list, &pending);
00497                 }
00498 
00499                 if (*sep == '#') {
00500                         /* scan for separator */
00501                         do {
00502                                 sep++;
00503                         } while (*sep != 0 && !lnet_issep(*sep));
00504                 }
00505 
00506                 if (*sep == 0)
00507                         break;
00508 
00509                 str = sep + 1;
00510         }
00511 
00512         list_splice(&pending, tbs->prev);
00513         return 0;
00514 }
00515 
00516 static int
00517 lnet_expand1tb(struct list_head *list,
00518                char *str, char *sep1, char *sep2,
00519                char *item, int itemlen)
00520 {
00521         int              len1 = (int)(sep1 - str);
00522         int              len2 = strlen(sep2 + 1);
00523         struct lnet_text_buf *ltb;
00524 
00525         LASSERT (*sep1 == '[');
00526         LASSERT (*sep2 == ']');
00527 
00528         ltb = lnet_new_text_buf(len1 + itemlen + len2);
00529         if (ltb == NULL)
00530                 return -ENOMEM;
00531 
00532         memcpy(ltb->ltb_text, str, len1);
00533         memcpy(&ltb->ltb_text[len1], item, itemlen);
00534         memcpy(&ltb->ltb_text[len1+itemlen], sep2 + 1, len2);
00535         ltb->ltb_text[len1 + itemlen + len2] = 0;
00536 
00537         list_add_tail(&ltb->ltb_list, list);
00538         return 0;
00539 }
00540 
00541 static int
00542 lnet_str2tbs_expand(struct list_head *tbs, char *str)
00543 {
00544         char              num[16];
00545         struct list_head  pending;
00546         char             *sep;
00547         char             *sep2;
00548         char             *parsed;
00549         char             *enditem;
00550         int               lo;
00551         int               hi;
00552         int               stride;
00553         int               i;
00554         int               nob;
00555         int               scanned;
00556 
00557         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&pending);
00558 
00559         sep = strchr(str, '[');
00560         if (sep == NULL)                        /* nothing to expand */
00561                 return 0;
00562 
00563         sep2 = strchr(sep, ']');
00564         if (sep2 == NULL)
00565                 goto failed;
00566 
00567         for (parsed = sep; parsed < sep2; parsed = enditem) {
00568 
00569                 enditem = ++parsed;
00570                 while (enditem < sep2 && *enditem != ',')
00571                         enditem++;
00572 
00573                 if (enditem == parsed)          /* no empty items */
00574                         goto failed;
00575 
00576                 if (sscanf(parsed, "%d-%d/%d%n", &lo, &hi, &stride, &scanned) < 3) {
00577 
00578                         if (sscanf(parsed, "%d-%d%n", &lo, &hi, &scanned) < 2) {
00579 
00580                                 /* simple string enumeration */
00581                                 if (lnet_expand1tb(&pending, str, sep, sep2,
00582                                                    parsed, (int)(enditem - parsed)) != 0)
00583                                         goto failed;
00584 
00585                                 continue;
00586                         }
00587 
00588                         stride = 1;
00589                 }
00590 
00591                 /* range expansion */
00592 
00593                 if (enditem != parsed + scanned) /* no trailing junk */
00594                         goto failed;
00595 
00596                 if (hi < 0 || lo < 0 || stride < 0 || hi < lo ||
00597                     (hi - lo) % stride != 0)
00598                         goto failed;
00599 
00600                 for (i = lo; i <= hi; i += stride) {
00601 
00602                         snprintf(num, sizeof(num), "%d", i);
00603                         nob = strlen(num);
00604                         if (nob + 1 == sizeof(num))
00605                                 goto failed;
00606 
00607                         if (lnet_expand1tb(&pending, str, sep, sep2,
00608                                            num, nob) != 0)
00609                                 goto failed;
00610                 }
00611         }
00612 
00613         list_splice(&pending, tbs->prev);
00614         return 1;
00615 
00616  failed:
00617         lnet_free_text_bufs(&pending);
00618         return -EINVAL;
00619 }
00620 
00621 static int
00622 lnet_parse_hops (char *str, unsigned int *hops)
00623 {
00624         int     len = strlen(str);
00625         int     nob = len;
00626 
00627         return (sscanf(str, "%u%n", hops, &nob) >= 1 &&
00628                 nob == len &&
00629                 *hops > 0 && *hops < 256);
00630 }
00631 
00632 #define LNET_PRIORITY_SEPARATOR (':')
00633 
00634 static int
00635 lnet_parse_priority(char *str, unsigned int *priority, char **token)
00636 {
00637         int   nob;
00638         char *sep;
00639         int   len;
00640 
00641         sep = strchr(str, LNET_PRIORITY_SEPARATOR);
00642         if (sep == NULL) {
00643                 *priority = 0;
00644                 return 0;
00645         }
00646         len = strlen(sep + 1);
00647 
00648         if ((sscanf((sep+1), "%u%n", priority, &nob) < 1) || (len != nob)) {
00649                 /* Update the caller's token pointer so it treats the found
00650                    priority as the token to report in the error message. */
00651                 *token += sep - str + 1;
00652                 return -EINVAL;
00653         }
00654 
00655         CDEBUG(D_NET, "gateway %s, priority %d, nob %d\n", str, *priority, nob);
00656 
00657         /*
00658          * Change priority separator to \0 to be able to parse NID
00659          */
00660         *sep = '\0';
00661         return 0;
00662 }
00663 
00664 static int
00665 lnet_parse_route (char *str, int *im_a_router)
00666 {
00667         /* static scratch buffer OK (single threaded) */
00668         static char       cmd[LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB];
00669 
00670         struct list_head  nets;
00671         struct list_head  gateways;
00672         struct list_head *tmp1;
00673         struct list_head *tmp2;
00674         __u32             net;
00675         lnet_nid_t        nid;
00676         struct lnet_text_buf  *ltb;
00677         int               rc;
00678         char             *sep;
00679         char             *token = str;
00680         int               ntokens = 0;
00681         int               myrc = -1;
00682         __u32             hops;
00683         int               got_hops = 0;
00684         unsigned int      priority = 0;
00685 
00686         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&gateways);
00687         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&nets);
00688 
00689         /* save a copy of the string for error messages */
00690         strncpy(cmd, str, sizeof(cmd));
00691         cmd[sizeof(cmd) - 1] = '\0';
00692 
00693         sep = str;
00694         for (;;) {
00695                 /* scan for token start */
00696                 while (isspace(*sep))
00697                         sep++;
00698                 if (*sep == 0) {
00699                         if (ntokens < (got_hops ? 3 : 2))
00700                                 goto token_error;
00701                         break;
00702                 }
00703 
00704                 ntokens++;
00705                 token = sep++;
00706 
00707                 /* scan for token end */
00708                 while (*sep != 0 && !isspace(*sep))
00709                         sep++;
00710                 if (*sep != 0)
00711                         *sep++ = 0;
00712 
00713                 if (ntokens == 1) {
00714                         tmp2 = &nets;           /* expanding nets */
00715                 } else if (ntokens == 2 &&
00716                            lnet_parse_hops(token, &hops)) {
00717                         got_hops = 1;           /* got a hop count */
00718                         continue;
00719                 } else {
00720                         tmp2 = &gateways;       /* expanding gateways */
00721                 }
00722 
00723                 ltb = lnet_new_text_buf(strlen(token));
00724                 if (ltb == NULL)
00725                         goto out;
00726 
00727                 strcpy(ltb->ltb_text, token);
00728                 tmp1 = &ltb->ltb_list;
00729                 list_add_tail(tmp1, tmp2);
00730 
00731                 while (tmp1 != tmp2) {
00732                         ltb = list_entry(tmp1, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
00733 
00734                         rc = lnet_str2tbs_expand(tmp1->next, ltb->ltb_text);
00735                         if (rc < 0)
00736                                 goto token_error;
00737 
00738                         tmp1 = tmp1->next;
00739 
00740                         if (rc > 0) {           /* expanded! */
00741                                 list_del(&ltb->ltb_list);
00742                                 lnet_free_text_buf(ltb);
00743                                 continue;
00744                         }
00745 
00746                         if (ntokens == 1) {
00747                                 net = libcfs_str2net(ltb->ltb_text);
00748                                 if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY) ||
00749                                     LNET_NETTYP(net) == LOLND)
00750                                         goto token_error;
00751                         } else {
00752                                 rc = lnet_parse_priority(ltb->ltb_text,
00753                                                          &priority, &token);
00754                                 if (rc < 0)
00755                                         goto token_error;
00756 
00757                                 nid = libcfs_str2nid(ltb->ltb_text);
00758                                 if (nid == LNET_NID_ANY ||
00759                                     LNET_NETTYP(LNET_NIDNET(nid)) == LOLND)
00760                                         goto token_error;
00761                         }
00762                 }
00763         }
00764 
00765         /* if there are no hops set then we want to flag this value as
00766          * unset since hops is an optional parameter */
00767         if (!got_hops)
00768                 hops = LNET_UNDEFINED_HOPS;
00769 
00770         LASSERT(!list_empty(&nets));
00771         LASSERT(!list_empty(&gateways));
00772 
00773         list_for_each(tmp1, &nets) {
00774                 ltb = list_entry(tmp1, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
00775                 net = libcfs_str2net(ltb->ltb_text);
00776                 LASSERT (net != LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY));
00777 
00778                 list_for_each(tmp2, &gateways) {
00779                         ltb = list_entry(tmp2, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
00780                         nid = libcfs_str2nid(ltb->ltb_text);
00781                         LASSERT(nid != LNET_NID_ANY);
00782 
00783                         if (lnet_islocalnid(nid)) {
00784                                 *im_a_router = 1;
00785                                 continue;
00786                         }
00787 
00788                         rc = lnet_add_route(net, hops, nid, priority);
00789                         if (rc != 0 && rc != -EEXIST && rc != -EHOSTUNREACH) {
00790                                 CERROR("Can't create route "
00791                                        "to %s via %s\n",
00792                                        libcfs_net2str(net),
00793                                        libcfs_nid2str(nid));
00794                                 goto out;
00795                         }
00796                 }
00797         }
00798 
00799         myrc = 0;
00800         goto out;
00801 
00802 token_error:
00803         lnet_syntax("routes", cmd, (int)(token - str), strlen(token));
00804 out:
00805         lnet_free_text_bufs(&nets);
00806         lnet_free_text_bufs(&gateways);
00807         return myrc;
00808 }
00809 
00810 static int
00811 lnet_parse_route_tbs(struct list_head *tbs, int *im_a_router)
00812 {
00813         struct lnet_text_buf   *ltb;
00814 
00815         while (!list_empty(tbs)) {
00816                 ltb = list_entry(tbs->next, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
00817 
00818                 if (lnet_parse_route(ltb->ltb_text, im_a_router) < 0) {
00819                         lnet_free_text_bufs(tbs);
00820                         return -EINVAL;
00821                 }
00822 
00823                 list_del(&ltb->ltb_list);
00824                 lnet_free_text_buf(ltb);
00825         }
00826 
00827         return 0;
00828 }
00829 
00830 int
00831 lnet_parse_routes (char *routes, int *im_a_router)
00832 {
00833         struct list_head tbs;
00834         int              rc = 0;
00835 
00836         *im_a_router = 0;
00837 
00838         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tbs);
00839 
00840         if (lnet_str2tbs_sep(&tbs, routes) < 0) {
00841                 CERROR("Error parsing routes\n");
00842                 rc = -EINVAL;
00843         } else {
00844                 rc = lnet_parse_route_tbs(&tbs, im_a_router);
00845         }
00846 
00847         LASSERT (lnet_tbnob == 0);
00848         return rc;
00849 }
00850 
00851 static int
00852 lnet_match_network_token(char *token, int len, __u32 *ipaddrs, int nip)
00853 {
00854         struct list_head list = LIST_HEAD_INIT(list);
00855         int             rc;
00856         int             i;
00857 
00858         rc = cfs_ip_addr_parse(token, len, &list);
00859         if (rc != 0)
00860                 return rc;
00861 
00862         for (rc = i = 0; !rc && i < nip; i++)
00863                 rc = cfs_ip_addr_match(ipaddrs[i], &list);
00864 
00865         cfs_expr_list_free_list(&list);
00866 
00867         return rc;
00868 }
00869 
00870 static int
00871 lnet_match_network_tokens(char *net_entry, __u32 *ipaddrs, int nip)
00872 {
00873         static char tokens[LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB];
00874 
00875         int   matched = 0;
00876         int   ntokens = 0;
00877         int   len;
00878         char *net = NULL;
00879         char *sep;
00880         char *token;
00881         int   rc;
00882 
00883         LASSERT (strlen(net_entry) < sizeof(tokens));
00884 
00885         /* work on a copy of the string */
00886         strcpy(tokens, net_entry);
00887         sep = tokens;
00888         for (;;) {
00889                 /* scan for token start */
00890                 while (isspace(*sep))
00891                         sep++;
00892                 if (*sep == 0)
00893                         break;
00894 
00895                 token = sep++;
00896 
00897                 /* scan for token end */
00898                 while (*sep != 0 && !isspace(*sep))
00899                         sep++;
00900                 if (*sep != 0)
00901                         *sep++ = 0;
00902 
00903                 if (ntokens++ == 0) {
00904                         net = token;
00905                         continue;
00906                 }
00907 
00908                 len = strlen(token);
00909 
00910                 rc = lnet_match_network_token(token, len, ipaddrs, nip);
00911                 if (rc < 0) {
00912                         lnet_syntax("ip2nets", net_entry,
00913                                     (int)(token - tokens), len);
00914                         return rc;
00915                 }
00916 
00917                 matched |= (rc != 0);
00918         }
00919 
00920         if (!matched)
00921                 return 0;
00922 
00923         strcpy(net_entry, net);                 /* replace with matched net */
00924         return 1;
00925 }
00926 
00927 static __u32
00928 lnet_netspec2net(char *netspec)
00929 {
00930         char   *bracket = strchr(netspec, '(');
00931         __u32   net;
00932 
00933         if (bracket != NULL)
00934                 *bracket = 0;
00935 
00936         net = libcfs_str2net(netspec);
00937 
00938         if (bracket != NULL)
00939                 *bracket = '(';
00940 
00941         return net;
00942 }
00943 
00944 static int
00945 lnet_splitnets(char *source, struct list_head *nets)
00946 {
00947         int               offset = 0;
00948         int               offset2;
00949         int               len;
00950         struct lnet_text_buf  *tb;
00951         struct lnet_text_buf  *tb2;
00952         struct list_head *t;
00953         char             *sep;
00954         char             *bracket;
00955         __u32             net;
00956 
00957         LASSERT(!list_empty(nets));
00958         LASSERT(nets->next == nets->prev);      /* single entry */
00959 
00960         tb = list_entry(nets->next, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
00961 
00962         for (;;) {
00963                 sep = strchr(tb->ltb_text, ',');
00964                 bracket = strchr(tb->ltb_text, '(');
00965 
00966                 if (sep != NULL &&
00967                     bracket != NULL &&
00968                     bracket < sep) {
00969                         /* netspec lists interfaces... */
00970 
00971                         offset2 = offset + (int)(bracket - tb->ltb_text);
00972                         len = strlen(bracket);
00973 
00974                         bracket = strchr(bracket + 1, ')');
00975 
00976                         if (bracket == NULL ||
00977                             !(bracket[1] == ',' || bracket[1] == 0)) {
00978                                 lnet_syntax("ip2nets", source, offset2, len);
00979                                 return -EINVAL;
00980                         }
00981 
00982                         sep = (bracket[1] == 0) ? NULL : bracket + 1;
00983                 }
00984 
00985                 if (sep != NULL)
00986                         *sep++ = 0;
00987 
00988                 net = lnet_netspec2net(tb->ltb_text);
00989                 if (net == LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY)) {
00990                         lnet_syntax("ip2nets", source, offset,
00991                                     strlen(tb->ltb_text));
00992                         return -EINVAL;
00993                 }
00994 
00995                 list_for_each(t, nets) {
00996                         tb2 = list_entry(t, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
00997 
00998                         if (tb2 == tb)
00999                                 continue;
01000 
01001                         if (net == lnet_netspec2net(tb2->ltb_text)) {
01002                                 /* duplicate network */
01003                                 lnet_syntax("ip2nets", source, offset,
01004                                             strlen(tb->ltb_text));
01005                                 return -EINVAL;
01006                         }
01007                 }
01008 
01009                 if (sep == NULL)
01010                         return 0;
01011 
01012                 offset += (int)(sep - tb->ltb_text);
01013                 len = strlen(sep);
01014                 tb2 = lnet_new_text_buf(len);
01015                 if (tb2 == NULL)
01016                         return -ENOMEM;
01017 
01018                 strncpy(tb2->ltb_text, sep, len);
01019                 tb2->ltb_text[len] = '\0';
01020                 list_add_tail(&tb2->ltb_list, nets);
01021 
01022                 tb = tb2;
01023         }
01024 }
01025 
01026 static int
01027 lnet_match_networks (char **networksp, char *ip2nets, __u32 *ipaddrs, int nip)
01028 {
01029         static char       networks[LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB];
01030         static char       source[LNET_SINGLE_TEXTBUF_NOB];
01031 
01032         struct list_head  raw_entries;
01033         struct list_head  matched_nets;
01034         struct list_head  current_nets;
01035         struct list_head *t;
01036         struct list_head *t2;
01037         struct lnet_text_buf  *tb;
01038         struct lnet_text_buf  *tb2;
01039         __u32             net1;
01040         __u32             net2;
01041         int               len;
01042         int               count;
01043         int               dup;
01044         int               rc;
01045 
01046         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&raw_entries);
01047         if (lnet_str2tbs_sep(&raw_entries, ip2nets) < 0) {
01048                 CERROR("Error parsing ip2nets\n");
01049                 LASSERT (lnet_tbnob == 0);
01050                 return -EINVAL;
01051         }
01052 
01053         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&matched_nets);
01054         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&current_nets);
01055         networks[0] = 0;
01056         count = 0;
01057         len = 0;
01058         rc = 0;
01059 
01060         while (!list_empty(&raw_entries)) {
01061                 tb = list_entry(raw_entries.next, struct lnet_text_buf,
01062                                 ltb_list);
01063 
01064                 strncpy(source, tb->ltb_text, sizeof(source));
01065                 source[sizeof(source) - 1] = '\0';
01066 
01067                 /* replace ltb_text with the network(s) add on match */
01068                 rc = lnet_match_network_tokens(tb->ltb_text, ipaddrs, nip);
01069                 if (rc < 0)
01070                         break;
01071 
01072                 list_del(&tb->ltb_list);
01073 
01074                 if (rc == 0) {                  /* no match */
01075                         lnet_free_text_buf(tb);
01076                         continue;
01077                 }
01078 
01079                 /* split into separate networks */
01080                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&current_nets);
01081                 list_add(&tb->ltb_list, &current_nets);
01082                 rc = lnet_splitnets(source, &current_nets);
01083                 if (rc < 0)
01084                         break;
01085 
01086                 dup = 0;
01087                 list_for_each(t, &current_nets) {
01088                         tb = list_entry(t, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
01089                         net1 = lnet_netspec2net(tb->ltb_text);
01090                         LASSERT(net1 != LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY));
01091 
01092                         list_for_each(t2, &matched_nets) {
01093                                 tb2 = list_entry(t2, struct lnet_text_buf,
01094                                                  ltb_list);
01095                                 net2 = lnet_netspec2net(tb2->ltb_text);
01096                                 LASSERT(net2 != LNET_NIDNET(LNET_NID_ANY));
01097 
01098                                 if (net1 == net2) {
01099                                         dup = 1;
01100                                         break;
01101                                 }
01102                         }
01103 
01104                         if (dup)
01105                                 break;
01106                 }
01107 
01108                 if (dup) {
01109                         lnet_free_text_bufs(&current_nets);
01110                         continue;
01111                 }
01112 
01113                 list_for_each_safe(t, t2, &current_nets) {
01114                         tb = list_entry(t, struct lnet_text_buf, ltb_list);
01115 
01116                         list_del(&tb->ltb_list);
01117                         list_add_tail(&tb->ltb_list, &matched_nets);
01118 
01119                         len += snprintf(networks + len, sizeof(networks) - len,
01120                                         "%s%s", (len == 0) ? "" : ",",
01121                                         tb->ltb_text);
01122 
01123                         if (len >= sizeof(networks)) {
01124                                 CERROR("Too many matched networks\n");
01125                                 rc = -E2BIG;
01126                                 goto out;
01127                         }
01128                 }
01129 
01130                 count++;
01131         }
01132 
01133  out:
01134         lnet_free_text_bufs(&raw_entries);
01135         lnet_free_text_bufs(&matched_nets);
01136         lnet_free_text_bufs(&current_nets);
01137         LASSERT (lnet_tbnob == 0);
01138 
01139         if (rc < 0)
01140                 return rc;
01141 
01142         *networksp = networks;
01143         return count;
01144 }
01145 
01146 static void
01147 lnet_ipaddr_free_enumeration(__u32 *ipaddrs, int nip)
01148 {
01149         LIBCFS_FREE(ipaddrs, nip * sizeof(*ipaddrs));
01150 }
01151 
01152 static int
01153 lnet_ipaddr_enumerate (__u32 **ipaddrsp)
01154 {
01155         int        up;
01156         __u32      netmask;
01157         __u32     *ipaddrs;
01158         __u32     *ipaddrs2;
01159         int        nip;
01160         char     **ifnames;
01161         int        nif = lnet_ipif_enumerate(&ifnames);
01162         int        i;
01163         int        rc;
01164 
01165         if (nif <= 0)
01166                 return nif;
01167 
01168         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ipaddrs, nif * sizeof(*ipaddrs));
01169         if (ipaddrs == NULL) {
01170                 CERROR("Can't allocate ipaddrs[%d]\n", nif);
01171                 lnet_ipif_free_enumeration(ifnames, nif);
01172                 return -ENOMEM;
01173         }
01174 
01175         for (i = nip = 0; i < nif; i++) {
01176                 if (!strcmp(ifnames[i], "lo"))
01177                         continue;
01178 
01179                 rc = lnet_ipif_query(ifnames[i], &up,
01180                                        &ipaddrs[nip], &netmask);
01181                 if (rc != 0) {
01182                         CWARN("Can't query interface %s: %d\n",
01183                               ifnames[i], rc);
01184                         continue;
01185                 }
01186 
01187                 if (!up) {
01188                         CWARN("Ignoring interface %s: it's down\n",
01189                               ifnames[i]);
01190                         continue;
01191                 }
01192 
01193                 nip++;
01194         }
01195 
01196         lnet_ipif_free_enumeration(ifnames, nif);
01197 
01198         if (nip == nif) {
01199                 *ipaddrsp = ipaddrs;
01200         } else {
01201                 if (nip > 0) {
01202                         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ipaddrs2, nip * sizeof(*ipaddrs2));
01203                         if (ipaddrs2 == NULL) {
01204                                 CERROR("Can't allocate ipaddrs[%d]\n", nip);
01205                                 nip = -ENOMEM;
01206                         } else {
01207                                 memcpy(ipaddrs2, ipaddrs,
01208                                         nip * sizeof(*ipaddrs));
01209                                 *ipaddrsp = ipaddrs2;
01210                                 rc = nip;
01211                         }
01212                 }
01213                 lnet_ipaddr_free_enumeration(ipaddrs, nif);
01214         }
01215         return nip;
01216 }
01217 
01218 int
01219 lnet_parse_ip2nets (char **networksp, char *ip2nets)
01220 {
01221         __u32     *ipaddrs = NULL;
01222         int        nip = lnet_ipaddr_enumerate(&ipaddrs);
01223         int        rc;
01224 
01225         if (nip < 0) {
01226                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x117, "Error %d enumerating local IP "
01227                                    "interfaces for ip2nets to match\n", nip);
01228                 return nip;
01229         }
01230 
01231         if (nip == 0) {
01232                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x118, "No local IP interfaces "
01233                                    "for ip2nets to match\n");
01234                 return -ENOENT;
01235         }
01236 
01237         rc = lnet_match_networks(networksp, ip2nets, ipaddrs, nip);
01238         lnet_ipaddr_free_enumeration(ipaddrs, nip);
01239 
01240         if (rc < 0) {
01241                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x119, "Error %d parsing ip2nets\n", rc);
01242                 return rc;
01243         }
01244 
01245         if (rc == 0) {
01246                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x11a, "ip2nets does not match "
01247                                    "any local IP interfaces\n");
01248                 return -ENOENT;
01249         }
01250 
01251         return 0;
01252 }
